<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:

18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">十月十七日在西雅图召开的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ACM</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">年会把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1977</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">年度</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ACM</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">图灵奖授予了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">John Backus</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。在介绍获奖人时，评奖委员会主席</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Jean E. Sammet</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">做了如下的评论，并宣读了授奖辞的一部分。全部授奖辞发布在《</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Communications</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">》</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1997</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">年第九期第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">681</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">页。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">“大概在场的人中没有不曾听说过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">的，</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">而且可能大多数人都至少用过一次，或者至少从编写</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序的人的肩膀后面看见过它。这里可能有几乎同样多的人听说过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">BNF</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，但并不一定知道它们代表什么。是的，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">B</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">代表</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Backus</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，其它的字母在正式引用中都已有解释。依我看来，这两项贡献都位于计算机领域最重要的六项技术贡献之中，</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">而且都是由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">John Backus</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">作出的（在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">中也包含了那些同事的贡献）。就是因为这些贡献，他获得了本年度的图灵奖。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">他的授奖辞简而言之‘因为意义深刻的，影响深远的，以及持续的对于实用高级程序设计系统设计的贡献，特别是他在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">方面的工作，因为对程序语言规范正式规程的开创性论文。’</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">全部授奖辞最重要的部分如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21.75pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">‘……</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1950</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">年代早期在纽约领导了一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IBM</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">小组。这个小组成果的早期产品是一个用于科学技术计算的高级语言，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。这个小组还设计了把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序翻译为机器语言的第一个系统。他们采用了新的优化技术生成更快的机器语言程序。这个语言的其他各种编译器也被开发出来，第一个基于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IBM</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">机器，后来的实际上可基于任何构成的计算机。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1966</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">年，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">被采纳为美国国家标准。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21.75pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1950</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">年代后期，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Backus</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">的国际委员会。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Algol </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言以及由它派生的编译器作为程序开发的工具，作为发布程序所基于的算法的工具，在欧洲获得了广泛的接受。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21.75pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1959</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">（联合国教科文组织）大会上递交了一份关于提议的国际代数语言的语义和语法的论文。在这篇论文中，他第一次采用了一种形式化技术用于规定程序语言的语法。这种形式化符号被称为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">BNF</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，它代表</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Backus Normal Form</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">”，</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">或者是“</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Backus Naur Form</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">”以纪念丹麦的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Peter Naur</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">所作出的进一步贡献。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21.75pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;

mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">在计算机问题求解的应用领域和存在于人工语言和计算机语言接合处的理论领域这两个领域都作出了重要的贡献。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Fortran</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class="MsoNormal"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">IBM </span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">传统程序语言正变得更加庞大却没有更加强大。在最基本层面上的固有缺陷使得它们即臃肿又脆弱：从它们共同的始祖——冯·诺伊曼计算机——继承而来的原始的一次一字程序设计风格，语义与状态转换的紧密耦合，程序设计中表达式世界和语句世界的分离，不能有效的使用强大的组合范式在已有的程序上建造新的程序，以及缺少进行程序验证的有用数学性质。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">另一个选择，函数式程序设计风格，基于组合范式的使用生成程序。函数式程序处理结构化的数据，是非重复的和非递归的，具有层次化结构，</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">没有命名它们的参数，不需要过程声明的复杂机制而变得一般适用。组合范式能通过一种在传统语言中不可能的风格，使用高级程序构造更高级的程序。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">与程序设计的函数式风格相关联的是一种程序代数，它的变量包括程序，它的运算是组合范式。这种代数能用来变换程序和求解“未知量”是程序的方程，使用与我们在中学代数中变换方程几乎一样的方法。这些变换由代数定理给出，而且用编写程序的相同语言执行。而之所以选择组合范式，不仅因为它们的程序设计能力，而且因为它们所关联的代数定理的能力。一般代数理论给出了各种程序的详细行为和终止条件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">一类新的计算系统在它的程序设计语言和状态转换规则两方面都使用了函数式程序设计风格。与冯·诺伊曼语言不同，这些系统具有与状态松散耦合的语义——只有一个状态转换发生在每次主要计算中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">程序设计语言似乎陷入了困境。每个后继语言都只是稍加整理的，把它的前任的所有特征加上一些更多的特征合并起来。有些语言的文档超过了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">500</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">页，另一些则使用浓缩的形式化方法把复杂的描述压缩到稍短些的文档中。国防部目前已有由委员会设计可能需要</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">000</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">页文档的语言标准的计划。每一个新的语言都声称有新的，时髦的特征，例如强类型，结构化控制语句，然而明显的事实是几乎没有语言使得程序设计变得足够便宜和更加可靠以证明生产和学会使用它们的成本是值得的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">因为程序规模的巨大增长仅仅带来功能上的微小增长，更为小巧简洁的语言，例如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">Pascal,</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">继续受到人们的欢迎。但是这里的极其强烈的需求，一个帮助我们思考程序的有力的方法学，却没有一个传统语言甚至是开始满足这个需求。事实上，传统语言在我们思考程序时造成了不必要的混淆。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">二十年来，程序设计语言一直在朝着它们如今臃肿的状况稳步发展。因此，研究和发明程序设计语言已经失去了它大部分的活力。相反，它现在是那些愿意与详细资料的庞大目录打交道而不愿意参与到新思想中去的人的领域了。对于程序设计语言的争论常常类似于中世纪对于一根针尖上能站几个天使的争论，而不是在一些截然不同的概念间的令人兴奋的争论。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

bold">许多有创造力的计算机科学家已经放弃发明语言转而去发明能描述它们的工具。不幸的是，他们很大程度上满足于把他们优雅的新工具应用于研究现有语言的疣子与痣。在使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">Dana Scott</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">开发的优雅工具分析了传统语言极其糟糕的类型结构之后，令人惊讶的是我们中如此多的人依然消极的满足于这种结构，而不是积极的去寻求新的结构。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:

bold">这篇文章有两重目的：一是指出传统语言框架的基本缺陷使得它们表达的虚弱及其癌变似的规模增长是不可避免的；二是指出在新型语言的设计中一些可供选择的探索路径。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">为了理解传统语言的问题，我们必须首先分析一下它们在智力上的起源，</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼计算机。什么是冯·诺伊曼计算机？在三十多年前冯·诺伊曼和其他人在构思它时，它是一个完美的，实用的，统一的概念，它简化了当时存在的许许多多的工程问题和程序设计问题。尽管产生它的架构的情况已经发生了根本的改变，我们仍然始终把“计算机”的概念等同于三十年前的陈旧概念。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">在最简单的形式下，一个冯·诺伊曼计算机由三部分组成：一个中央处理器（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">CPU</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">），一个存储器和在处理器和存储器之间传送单个字（发送一个地址到存储器）的连接通道。我倾向于称这个通道为<i>冯·诺伊曼瓶颈</i>。一个程序的工作就主要在于更改存储器中的内容，当你意识到这项工作必须完全靠通过冯·诺伊曼瓶颈来回发送单个字完成，那么以此称呼它的原因就十分清楚了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">具有讽刺意味的是，通过这个瓶颈的大部分通信并不是有用的数据而只不过是一些数据的名字，以及仅仅在这些名字中使用的操作和数据。在一个字通过通道发送之前，它的地址必须在处理器中。因此它必须或者是通过通道从存储器中发送而来的，或者是由一些处理器的操作生成的。如果一个地址是从存储器中发送而来的，那么（这个地址的）地址必须或者是已经从存储器中发送过来，或者是处理器生成的，诸如此类可以依次类推。另一种情况，如果这个地址是处理器生成的，那么它必须或者是是由确定规则生成（例如：将程序计数器加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">），或者是由通过通道发送来的指令所生成。这种情况下，（这个指令的）地址必须或者是……，诸如此类亦可依次类推。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">确实这里应该有一个不那么原始的方法来执行存储器里的大量更改，而不是通过冯·诺伊曼瓶颈来来回回的传送大量的字内容。这个通道不仅是求解问题的数据通信的直接瓶颈，而且更重要的是，它是使我们束缚于一次一字的思维方式而不是鼓励我们使用手上任务的更多的概念进行思考的智力上的瓶颈。因此程序设计主要是规划和详细设计通过冯·诺伊曼瓶颈的大量字的通信，而且大部分通信并不涉及那些重要的数据本身而只是关心于在哪里找到这些数据。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">Algol 68</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">的差别尽管是巨大的，但是相比于二者都是基于冯·诺伊曼计算机的程序设计风格的事实就显得不是那么显著了。注意到它们的起源和风格，我也把传统语言叫做“冯·诺伊曼语言”，但是我当然不是为它们的复杂而责备这位伟大的数学家。事实上，有人也许会说我应该为这个问题承担一些责任。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼式程序设计语言使用变量来模拟计算机的存储单元，使用控制语句来描述它的判断跳转指令，使用赋值语句模拟它的提取、存储和算数运算。赋值语句是程序设计语言的冯·诺伊曼瓶颈，而且像计算机瓶颈所做的那样使我们束缚于一次一字的思维模式。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">设想一个典型程序，它的核心是许多含有一些下标变量的赋值语句。每条赋值语句产生一个一字结果。当为了在存储器中执行所需的全部变动而更改下标值时，程序必定会使这些语句执行多次，因为它只能以一次一字的方式被执行。程序设计者因而关注于通过赋值瓶颈的字流，因为他要设计控制语句的嵌套以引起这种必需的重复。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">此外，赋值语句还把程序设计分裂为两个世界。第一个由赋值语句的右侧组成。这是一个有序的表达式的世界，一个具有有用的代数性质的世界（如果不是那些性质常常被副作用所破坏）。它也是大部分有用的计算发生的世界。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">传统程序设计语言的第二个世界是语句的世界。这个世界中主要的语句是赋值语句自身。语言中所有其他语句的存在都是是为了使那些基于这种基本结构——赋值语句——的计算能够有可能执行。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">语句的世界是一个混乱的世界，几乎没有有用的数学性质。结构化程序设计可以看作是某种程度的努力，以为这个混乱的世界引入一点秩序。但是它几乎不能解决程序设计的一次一字的冯·诺伊曼风格，循环、下标和分支控制语句的原始使用，所造成的基本问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">我们对冯·诺伊曼语言的过于执着还延续着冯·诺伊曼计算机的主导地位，而我们对它（冯·诺伊曼计算机）的依赖使得非冯·诺伊曼语言效率低下并且限制了它的发展。基于非冯·诺伊曼原则的，完备有效的程序设计风格的缺失使得设计者缺乏新计算机体系结构的理论基础。（关于该问题的一个简单讨论参见</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">15</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">节）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">应用式计算系统没有存储和历史敏感性是它们不能为计算机设计提供基础的基本原因。此外，大部分应用式系统采用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">演算的替换操作作为他们的基本操作。这种操作是实质上具有无限力量的一种操作，但是它的完整有效实现对于机器设计者提出了巨大的困难。而且，在引入存储和改善它们在冯·诺伊曼计算机上的效率的努力中，应用式系统已经趋于被吞没在一个巨大的冯·诺伊曼系统中。例如，纯粹的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">Lisp</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">语言经常被掩埋在许多的冯·诺伊曼特征的巨大扩展中。因而产生的复杂系统几乎不能为机器设计者提供指导。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">14</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">节草拟了一种系统。这种系统设计来使得上述程序设计的函数式风格在历史敏感的系统上也可能实现。但是在上述的应用风格能够成为优雅实用的程序设计语言的基础之前，仍然有大量的工作有待完成。目前而言，上面的比较展示了冯·诺伊曼程序设计语言的许多缺陷，可以被看作是试图解释它们目前臃肿和虚弱状况的努力的出发点。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">6<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言框架与可变部分</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">让我们区分一下程序设计语言的两个部分。第一部分，<i>框架</i>，给出系统的全部规则；第二部分，<i>可变部分</i>，它的存在是框架预先规划好的，但它的具体行为不是由框架定义的。例如，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">for</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">语句和几乎所有其他语句都是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">框架的一部分，而库函数和用户定义的过程是可变部分。因而一个语言的框架描述了它的确定特征，并为可变的征提供了一个一般环境。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">现在假设一个语言有一个小框架，它能够把各种各样的强大特征完全作为可变部分而容纳进去。那么这样的一个框架将能够支持许多不同特征和风格而不用改变自身。与这种令人愉快的可能性形成鲜明对照的是，</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">冯·诺伊曼似乎总是有一个巨大的框架和十分有限的可变部分。是什么导致这种情况的出现？答案涉及到冯·诺伊曼语言的两个问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">第一个问题来自于一次一字程序设计的</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">冯·诺伊曼风格。这种风格要求字在状态之间来回流动，就像通过冯·诺伊曼瓶颈的流动一样。因而，一个冯·诺伊曼语言必须有一个与状态紧密耦合的语义。在这种语义里，一次计算的每个细节都将改变状态。与状态紧耦合语义的后果就是每个特征的每个细节都必须建立在状态和状态转换规则之上。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">因而冯·诺伊曼语言的每一个特征都必须在框架的令人茫然的细节里详细说明。而且，许多复杂特征还需要支持基本的，虚弱的一次一字风格。其结果就是不可避免的严格和冯·诺伊曼语言的庞大框架。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">7<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">可变部分和组合范式</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">冯·诺伊曼语言的</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">第二个问题是它们的可变部分几乎没有表达力量。它们庞大的规模就是生动的证明。毕竟，如果设计者们知道他现在设计进框架中的所有那些复杂特征可以添加到稍后的可变部分去，他也不会如此热心于把它们设计进框架中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">或许一个语言中提供强大可变部分的最重要的要素是能够一般应用于从旧的过程构造新的过程的组合范式的可用性。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">冯·诺伊曼语言只能提供基本的组合范式，而且冯·诺伊曼框架建造了它们的完全使用的障碍。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">组合范式使用的一个障碍是冯·诺伊曼语言中表达世界和语句世界的分离。函数范式自然的属于表达世界，然而无论它们有多么强大，它们只能构造出产生一字结果的表达式。而且在语句世界中，这些一字结果必须组合进全部结果中。组合单个字并不是我们真正应该思考的，然而它却是冯·诺伊曼语言中设计一个任务的很大部分。为了帮助我们从单个字中组装出全部结果，这些语言在语句世界中提供了一些基本的组合范式——</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">for</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">while</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">if</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">－</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">then</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">－</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">else</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">语句，然而这两个世界的分离阻碍了组合范式在两个世界的任何一个中，获得它们在一个同一世界中所能达到的全部力量。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">冯·诺伊曼语言中组合范式使用的第二个障碍是它们精致的命名约定的使用，这种约定还因过程调用的代入规则而更加复杂。所有这些都需要一个复杂机制以设计进框架中，以使变量，下标变量，指针，文件名，过程名，按值调用形式参数，按名字调用形式参数等等，能够被恰当解释。所有这些名字，约定和规则都妨碍了简单组合范式的使用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">8<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">APL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">与一次一字程序设计</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">既然我已经说了这么多有关一次一字的程序设计，现在我必须讨论一下</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">APL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">（应用式程序设计语言）了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[12]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。我们应该深深的感谢</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Kenneth Iverson</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">为我们指出了存在着既不是一次一字也不是依赖于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">表达式的程序，同时把新的函数范式的使用介绍给我们。而且，既然</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">APL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">赋值语句能够存储数组，它的函数范式的的效果就已被扩充而超越了单个赋值了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">不幸的是，尽管如此，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">APL</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">仍然把程序设计拆分为表达世界和语句世界。因而，编写一行程序的努力，部分来自于想要呆在更有序的表达世界的推动。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">APL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">仅仅含三个函数范式，称为内积，外积和归约。这些有时难以使用，也没有足够的函数范式，而且它们的使用局限于表达世界。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">最后，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">APL</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">仍然与状态耦合得过于紧密。从而不管语言有多么强大和简单，它的框架也有冯·诺伊曼语言复杂和严格的特点。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">9<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">      
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">冯·诺伊曼语言缺乏有用数学性质</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">到目前为止，我们已经讨论了冯·诺伊曼语言的庞大规模和不灵活性。而另一个重要缺陷则是有用数学性质的缺乏，和进行程序验证的障碍。尽管已经发表了大量有关程序验证的的杰出著作，冯·诺伊曼语言几乎没有在这方面有帮助的性质，相反却有许多成为障碍的性质（例如，副效应，别名）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">指称语义</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[23]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">和它的基础</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[20</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">21]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">提供了一个非常有帮助的，隐含于程序中的函数空间和论域的数学理解。当应用于应用式语言（例如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[16]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">中的“递归程序”中的语言）时，它的基础提供了一个强大的工具以描述这种语言并证明程序性质。另一方面，当应用于冯·诺伊曼语言时，它提供了一个准确的语义描述并且有助于确定语言的问题之处。但是语言的复杂性也反映在描述的复杂性之中。这种描述是生成式，论域，函数和等式的令人困惑的集合，在程序验证时只比语言的用户手册稍微有些帮助，因为它稍为不那么含糊。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">公理化语义</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[11]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">准确的重新陈述了冯·诺伊曼程序作为一个谓词判断转换（例如，状态转换）的不优雅性质。这种一次一字，重复性的博弈并没有因此而改变，只不过博弈场所改变了。冯·诺伊曼程序证明的公理化博弈理论的复杂性使得它的参与者的成功都更加的令人惊叹。除了他们的天才之外，他们的成功依赖于两个因素：第一，这种博弈理论局限在完整冯·诺伊曼语言的小的弱子集上面，这比实际语言简单得多；第二，新的博弈场所（谓词判断和它们的转换）比起旧的（状态和它们的转换）来更加丰富，有序和有效。但是把这种博弈限制和转换到一个更有效的论域并不能使它处理真实的程序（的过程调用和别名所需的复杂性），也不能使它消除基本的冯·诺伊曼风格的笨拙性质。因为公理化语义的扩展覆盖了典型的冯·诺伊曼语言的更多部分，它开始随着这种扩展所需要的不断增长的复杂性而失去了它的有效性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">因而指称语义和公理化语义都是描述性的形式化方法，它们的基础包含了优雅而有力的概念。但是使用它们描述冯·诺伊曼语言不可能产生一个优雅而有力的语言，就像使用建造</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Edsel</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">的优雅现代的机器不能生产出一辆汽车。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">无论如何，程序证明使用的是逻辑语言，而不是程序设计语言。证明谈论的是程序但又不能直接包括程序，因为冯·诺伊曼语言的公理是如此的没有用处。与此相反，许多寻常的证明是来自于代数方法的。这些方法要求语言具有某些代数性质。那样代数定理能够通过一个十分机械的方式，把一个问题变换到它的解。例如，解方程</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:3.0pt;mso-text-raise:-3.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape

mso-font-kerning:0pt">（假设</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:3.0pt;mso-text-raise:

mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">），我们机械的应用分配律，同一律和消去律，逐次可以获得</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">从而我们没有离开这种代数“语言”就证明了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><span style="position:relative;
top:3.0pt;mso-text-raise:-3.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1063"

mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">。冯·诺伊曼语言，具有奇形怪状的语法，几乎没有提供这种变换程序的可能性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">正如我们稍后将看到的，程序可以用具有相关联的代数的语言来表达。这种代数能被用于变换程序，并通过与你在高中代数里求解方程非常相似的方法，求解一些“未知量”是程序的方程。代数变换和证明使用程序语言自身，而不是讨论程序的逻辑语言。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">10<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">什么是相对于冯·诺伊曼语言的另一些选择？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">在讨论相对于冯·诺伊曼语言的另一些选择之前，让我评论一下以上这些，我感到十分抱歉的，负面的，并不十分准确的，关于这些语言的讨论。但是我们大部分人对于这些大量的虚弱的语言的自满的接受，已经迷惑和干扰了我很长一段时间。我被它扰乱了，因为这种接受消耗了巨大的精力在使得冯·诺伊曼语言更加臃肿上，而这本可以更好的用于寻找一些新的结构。为了这个原因，我已经尝试分析了冯·诺伊曼语言的一些基本的缺陷，并且指出这些缺陷不可能被解决，除非我们发现一种新的语言框架。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">在寻找对于传统语言的另一个选择时，我们必须首先认识到，一个系统不可能是历史敏感的（允许一个程序的执行影响接下来的程序的行为），除非这个系统具有几种状态（第一个程序能够更改它而第二个程序能够访问它）。因此，一个历史敏感的计算系统的模型在最弱的意义上也必须具有至少一个状态转换的语义。但是，这绝不意味着每一个计算都必须严重依赖于计算的的每一小部分都需要许多状态改变的复杂状态（如同冯·诺伊曼语言中一样）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">为了阐明相对于冯·诺伊曼语言的另一些选择，我打算简单描述一下这类历史敏感的计算系统。每个这种系统都：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">a</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">）具有松散耦合的状态转换语义，这种语义中状态转换只发生在主要的计算中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">b</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">）具有简单结构的状态和简单转换规则。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">）严重依赖底层的应用式系统以提供这种系统的基本的程序设计语言，以及描述它的转换规则。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">这些我称之为应用式状态转换（简称</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">）的系统将在第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">14</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">节描述。这些简单的系统避免了许多冯·诺伊曼语言的复杂性和弱点，提供了一系列强大的，可扩展的可变部分。尽管如此，他们只是被简略的叙述，作为具有各种各样吸引人的性质的，非冯·诺伊曼语言广阔领域的一些基本的例子。在过去的三到四年中我一直在研究这个领域，还没有发现对这些相互冲突的需求的一个满意解决，而这是一个好的语言必须解决的。但是我相信这种探索已经揭示出一条通往非冯·诺伊曼语言设计的有用之路。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">这条道路包括四个部分，可以概括如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt">a）<span style="font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span><!--[endif]--><i><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">没有变量的程序设计的函数式风格</span></i><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。一个简单的，非正式的函数式程序设计（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">）系统会被描述。它是基于构造程序中组合范式的使用的。几个程序将会被给出以说明函数式程序设计。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt">b）<span style="font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span><!--[endif]--><i><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">函数式程序的代数</span></i><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。一个代数将被描述为：它的变量是函数式程序，而它的“运算”是函数范式。一些代数定理也将给出。理论和例子也会给出，以说明某些函数表达式如何可能被转化为等价的能够解释函数行为的无限扩展。函数式程序设计的代数与经典的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Church</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Curry</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">应用式系统的关联代数的比较。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 39pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt">c）<span style="font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span><!--[endif]--><i><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">一个正式的函数式程序设计系统</span></i><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">。所描述的正式的（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">FFP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">）系统扩展了上述非正式的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">在本节，我们给出了称之为函数式程序设计（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">）系统的，一类简单应用式程序设计系统的非正式描述，在这种系统里“程序”就是没有变量的一些简单函数。紧接着描述的是一些例子和一个关于函数式程序设计的各种性质的讨论。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统是建立在称为函数范式的一组固定的组合范式上的集合上的。这些，再加上简单定义，是从已有函数基础上构造新的函数的唯一工具。它们没有使用变量或者代入规则，它们成为了程序的相关联代数的运算。一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统的所有函数具有同一个类型：它们是对象到对象的映射，而且总是只接受单个参数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">与此相反，一个基于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">演算的系统建立在构造新函数时</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">表达式的使用之上，具有关于变量，构造新函数的，相关代入规则集合。（具有它的代入规则的）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">表达式能够定义具有任意参数，所有类型的所有可计算函数。这种自由和力量有缺陷也有显而易见的优点。这就是类似于传统语言中不受限制的控制语句的力量：伴随着不受限制的自由也带来了混乱。如果你总是创造新的组合范式以满足需要，就像你能在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">演算中做的一样，你将不会熟悉这种风格，或者说是能够满足所有需要的少数几个组合范式的有用性质。正如结构化程序设计通过避免过多的控制语句，获得了具有更简单结构，更好性质和统一方法的程序，以理解程序行为一样，函数式程序设计语言避免了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">表达式、代入和多重函数类型。它因而实现了通过具有已知有用性质的，熟悉的函数范式构造程序。这些程序是结构化的，因而它们的行为经常能被理解，能够通过代数方法的机械使用来证明，这些方法类似于那些用于求解高中代数问题的方法。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">函数范式，与大部分程序设计结构不同，并不需要在特殊的基础上选取。既然它们是相关联代数的运算，你只需要选择那些既能提供有力的程序设计结构又具有吸引人的代数性质的函数范式：你可以选择它们以最大程度的发挥使它们与系统的其他函数范式关联起来的代数定理的力量和利用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">以下描述的程序代数是一个代数业余爱好者的工作，而且我想说明它是一个业余爱好者能有益参加和享受的游戏，一个不需要对逻辑和数学的深刻理解的游戏。尽管它很简单，它却能够帮助你系统的而不是机械的理解和证明关于程序的一些事情。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">到目前为止，证明一个程序的正确性需要数学和逻辑的一些稍显深奥的主题的知识：完全偏序集的性质，连续函数，函数的最小不动点，一阶谓词演算，谓词变换，最弱前置条件，以及为了证明程序正确性的一些方法而涉及的一些主题。这些主题对于把发明证明技巧作为他们的事业的专业人员非常有用；他们已经出版了许多关于这些主题的杰出著作，从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">McCarthy</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Floyd</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Dijkstra</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

"Times New Roman"">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Morris</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（指称语义）和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">C.A.RHoare</span><span style="font-size:

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">如果要让普通程序员能够证明他的程序的正确性，他需要比那些专业人员目前所使用的更为简单的技术。以下的程序代数可能就是这种证明学的一个出发点，与目前对于代数操作的工作结合起来，它可能有助于提供一个基础以自动证明这个学科中的一些问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;

"Times New Roman"">正如我们已经看到的，一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";

</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;

mso-font-kerning:0pt">应用式状态转换系统（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";

<h2 style="margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:
28.8pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level2 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">14.1<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">    </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">简介</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">这一节略述了早先提及的作为</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼之外的另一种选择的</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">一类系统。必须反复强调的一点是，这些应用式状态转换系统不是作为在现有形式中的实际程序设计系统，而是作为应用式风格程序设计在历史敏感性，但非</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼式的系统</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">中实现的一类例子提出的</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">。这些系统是松散耦合于状态的，而且它们的程序设计语言和状态转换说明二者都依赖于隐含的应用式系统。以下描述的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">系统的隐含的应用式系统是一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">FFP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">系统，但是其他的应用式系统也可以使用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">为了理解</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">系统结构的合理性，先回顾一下冯·诺伊曼系统，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">，的基本结构，观察它的局限性，比较它的结构与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">系统的结构是有帮助的。在这个回顾之后，一个极小的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">系统被描述出来，一个小的，自顶而下的，文件维护的自我保护系统和执行用户程序将被给出——朝着把它建立在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">系统之上和运行一个用户程序例子的方向。系统程序使用“命名函数”代替传统名字，而且用户也可以这么做。这节从下面子节讨论的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">系统的变体总结出它们的一般性质和命名系统。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:
28.8pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level2 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">14.2<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">    </span></span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">结构与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:黑体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统结构的比较</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">程序是一个语句序列，每一个语句都代表一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">状态变换，这种状态是各种各样的栈，指针，和映射标识符到值的变量等等的复杂的信息仓库。每一个语句都与这个不停变化的状态传达信息，以它自身甚至是不同部分所特有的复杂协议（例如，与变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:3.0pt;
mso-text-raise:-3.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1760" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:10pt;height:11pt' o:ole="">
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image257.wmz"
  o:title=""/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="10" height="11" src="quiver-image-url/C1B11D9C660073BFF63AF438A3807709.gif" v:shapes="_x0000_i1760"><!--[endif]--></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.DSMT4" ShapeID="_x0000_i1760"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1572890180">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">相关的协议依赖于它出现在赋值符号的左边还是右边，是在一个声明中，还是作为一个参数，等等。）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">看起来似乎</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">状态是一个复杂的“存储器”，它通过许多专门线路的大量“电缆”与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">通信。这个电缆的复杂通信协议是固定的而且对每一个语句类型而言都包含那些。一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">程序的“涵义”必须根据通过这个电缆和它的协议与状态的大量通信（加上识别输出和插入输入到状态的方法）的总的效果来给出。通过与到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">状态</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">/</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">存储的大量电缆的比较，电缆，它是计算机的</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼瓶颈，是一个简单，优雅的概念。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">因此，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">语句不是代表状态到状态的函数的表达式，这种函数是通过从简单的状态到状态的函数的有序复合得到的。相反，它们是与上下文部分依赖的复杂<i>消息</i>，它们一点点的修改着状态。每一个部分都以它自己的协议通过电缆输出和接收信息到状态。这里没有提供应用一般函数于<i>整个</i>状态，从而对它进行大的修改。通过函数应用，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:5.0pt;
mso-text-raise:-5.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1761" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:48pt;height:16pt' o:ole="">
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image1204.wmz"
  o:title=""/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="48" height="16" src="quiver-image-url/A4B3BD27A8C0DB50AF325ED7F716BB07.gif" v:shapes="_x0000_i1761"><!--[endif]--></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1572890181">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，使得状态</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:3.0pt;
mso-text-raise:-3.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1762" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:10pt;height:14pt' o:ole="">
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image1206.wmz"
  o:title=""/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="10" height="14" src="quiver-image-url/5F31BC98888B83F916D0A3BD01D2CB5D.gif" v:shapes="_x0000_i1762"><!--[endif]--></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.DSMT4" ShapeID="_x0000_i1762"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1572890182">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">获得的大的，有力的变换的可能在</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼——电缆和协议——语境中</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">事实上是难以想象的：这里可能不能保证新状态</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:5.0pt;
mso-text-raise:-5.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1763" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:25pt;height:16pt' o:ole="">
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image1208.wmz"
  o:title=""/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="25" height="16" src="quiver-image-url/6D1C349A328E7516747C8FC3A482DF96.gif" v:shapes="_x0000_i1763"><!--[endif]--></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.DSMT4" ShapeID="_x0000_i1763"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1572890183">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">将会满足电缆和它的固定协议，除非</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:5.0pt;
mso-text-raise:-5.0pt"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1764" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:12pt;height:16pt' o:ole="">
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image1210.wmz"
  o:title=""/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="12" height="16" src="quiver-image-url/C5D118C54B797FB7E3584BFD201D19F2.gif" v:shapes="_x0000_i1764"><!--[endif]--></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.DSMT4" ShapeID="_x0000_i1764"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1572890184">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">被限定于为第一步电缆所许可的微小的变化。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">我们想要一个系统，它的语义不依赖于许多巴洛克式的协议来与状态通信；我们想要能够通过一般函数的应用在状态上实现大的变换。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统提供了一条达到这个目标的道路。它们的语义有两个从状态中获取信息的协议：（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）从状态中得到一个将被应用的函数定义；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）得到整个状态自身。有一个协议是改变状态的：通过函数应用计算出新的状态。除了与状态的这些通信以外，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">语义是应用式的（例如，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FFP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）。它并不依赖于状态变化，因为状态在计算期间根本不发生变化。相反，计算结果是输出和一个新的状态。一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">状态的结构稍微的受到它的一个协议的限制：必须能够识别在它内部的定义</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">(</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">例如，单元</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。它的结构——是一个序列——远比</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">状态的结构简单。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">因此，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统的结构避免了</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼状态</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（及其通信协议）的复杂性和局限性，而在一个根本不同的，更为简单的框架里实现了更大的能力和自由。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;margin-left:
28.8pt;line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level2 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统由三个部分组成：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l22 level1 lfo16;

font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l22 level1 lfo16;

mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">一个<i>状态</i></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:2.0pt;

mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，它是应用式子系统的定义集合</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l22 level1 lfo16;

mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">一个<i>变换规则</i>集合，描述了输入怎样被变换到输出，状态</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:2.0pt;

 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">又是怎样被改变的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统的程序设计语言只是它的应用式子系统的语言。（从这里开始，我们将假设后者是一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FFP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统。）因此</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统能够使用我们讨论过的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">程序设计风格。应用式子系统不能改变状态</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:2.0pt;

 style='width:13pt;height:13pt' o:ole="">

"Times New Roman"">我们的小型的系统程序没有提供给予用户程序控制以处理许多输入的能力，但是给予它这种能力同时可以收回控制以监控这些用户程序并不难。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">以上提出的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统的一个主要扩展提供了组合范式，“系统范式”以从更简单的，可组合的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统建造新的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统。也就是说，一个系统范式将以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统作为参数生成一个新的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统，就像函数范式以函数作为参数生成新的函数一样。这些系统范式将有像函数范式一样的性质，将像函数范式是程序代数的“运算”一样，成为一个有用的“系统代数”的“运算”。尽管如此，找到有用的系统范式的问题是非常困难的，因为它们必须处理</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><span style="position:relative;top:3.0pt;
