mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，匹配输入和输出，且组合历史敏感的系统而不是固定的函数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">此外，系统范式的有用性，或者需求比起函数范式的是很不清楚的。后者对于从一个初始的原语集合建造更多不同的函数来说是必不可少的，与此相反，甚至没有系统范式，建造</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统的工具就已经如此丰富以致你能建造任何一个实质上的系统（具有给出的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">设计中允许的一般的输入输出性质）。也许系统范式会有利于建立一个具有复杂输入输出安排的系统。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l12 level1 lfo20;

Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">14.7<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">    </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:
Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:黑体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和冯·诺伊曼模型中的命名系统</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统中，命名是由像在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">13.3.3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">节中简要说明的函数完成的。许多更改和访问存储器的有用函数能够被定义（例如，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">push</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">pop</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">purge</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">typed fetch</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">等等）。所有这些定义和它们的相关命名系统能够不改变</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">框架的引入。有单独命名系统的不同“存储器”（例如，具有“带类型的单元”）能够用于一个程序中。存储器中的一个单元可以包含另外的整个存储。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">关于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">命名系统的重点是它们利用了名字的函数本质（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Reyond’s </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GEDANKEN[19]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

bold"> a</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）名字不能作为函数应用；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">b</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">）没有一般方法以与其他的名字和函数组合名字；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">c</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）命名函数应用的对象（存储）不是可访问的对象。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼语言把名字作为函数对待的失效也许是它们更重要的弱点之一。无论如何，像函数一样使用名字和像对象一样存储名字的能力可能最终证明是一个有用且重要的程序设计概念，一个应该被彻底探索的概念。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">15<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">关于计算机设计的评论</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼语言的统治地位使得相对于实际计算机设计中远为繁多的各种各样的冯·诺伊曼计算机而言，只给了设计者不多的理论模型。数据流模型</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">[1][7][13]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">是历史敏感模型的另一个选择。基于语言的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">演算的置换规则向机器设计者提出了严重的问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">Berkling[3]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">已发展出一种修改后的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">演算，它有三种应用且它使得变量的重命名不再必要。他已发展出一种机器来计算这种语言的表达式。需要更进一步的体验以表明这种语言对于有效的程序设计风格而言有一个多么合理的基础，表明他的机器能够多么有效率。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    Mago[15]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">发展出了一种新的从同样的（两种）组件建造而来的应用式机器。它直接的，从下到上的，求值类</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">的和其他的应用表达式。它没有冯·诺伊曼的存储器，也没有地址寄存器，因而没有瓶颈；它能够并行计算许多应用；它的内置操作类似于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">运算而不是冯·诺伊曼计算机操作。它是对我见过的冯·诺伊曼计算机最大的程度的违背。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">这里有无数的迹象表明程序设计的应用式风格能够变得比冯·诺伊曼风格更为强大。因此对程序设计员而言，重要的是发展一类新的历史敏感的计算系统的模型，它能体现这种风格并避免固有的，似乎是依附于基于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">演算的系统的效率问题。只有当这些模型和它们的应用式语言已经证明了它们超过传统语言的优越性，我们才会有经济基础发展这种新的，能最好的实现它们的计算机。也许只有那时，我们才能够在计算机设计中完全利用大规模集成电路而不受到冯·诺伊曼瓶颈的限制。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 style="line-height:normal;mso-list:l38 level1 lfo1"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">16<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";"> 
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">摘要</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">这篇文章的前面十五节能够概述如下。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第一节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">传统设计语言是巨大的，复杂的和不灵活的。它们受限的表达能力是与它们的规模和成本不相称的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第二节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">隐含在程序设计语言之下的计算系统模型粗略的归为三类：（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">a</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）简单操作模型（例如，图灵机），（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt">b</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）应用式模型（例如，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">演算），（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">c</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼模型（例如，传统计算机和程序设计语言）。每一类模型有一个重要的困难：（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">a</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）类的程序是难以理解的；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">b</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">）类模型不能存储信息从一个程序到接下来的程序；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">c</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）类模型有不能使用的基础和无助于概念理解的程序。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第三节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼计算机建立在一个瓶颈之上：连接</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">CPU</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">和存储器的一次一字的管道。因为一个程序必须通过在冯·诺伊曼瓶颈中来回的传递大量字以在存储器中完成它的全部更改，我们是同关注于它自身通过瓶颈的一次一字交换，而不是我们的问题的大的概念单元的程序设计风格一起成长起来的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第四节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">传统语言基于</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼计算机的程序设计风格的。因此变量＝存储单元；赋值语句＝提取，存储和算法；控制语句＝判断跳转指令。符号“：＝”是语言上的冯·诺伊曼瓶颈。在传统——冯·诺伊曼——语言中的程序设计仍然关注于它自身在有些更加复杂的瓶颈中的一次一字交换。冯·诺伊曼语言也把程序设计分裂为表达式的世界和语句的世界；其中第一个是一个有序的世界，第二个是一个混乱的世界，一个结构化程序设计可以简化一些但不能解决它自身的分裂和传统语言的一次一字风格的基本问题的世界。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第五节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">这一节比较了对于内积的</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼程序和函数式程序。它阐明了许多前者的问题和后者的优点：例如，冯·诺伊曼程序是反复的和一次一字的，仅适用于给定长度</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">n</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">，名为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">a</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">b</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">两个向量，且只能通过过程声明的使用变得一般化，而这有复杂的语义。函数式程序是非反复的，把向量以单位处理，有更加层次化的结构，是完全一般化的，能通过复合高级内务处理操作生成“内务处理”操作。它没有命名它的参数，因而它不需要过程声明。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第六节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">程序设计语言由一个框架及一些可变部分组成。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼语言的框架要求大部分特征必须建立在它之中；它只能容纳受限的可变部分（例如，用户定义的过程），因为这里必须有“状态”中的详细规定和可变部分以及建立在框架中的所有特征的所有需要的转换规则。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼框架如此不灵活的原因是它的语义太紧密耦合于状态：计算的每一个细节都要改变状态。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第七节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼语言的可变部分几乎没有表达能力；这就是为什么语言的大部分必须建立在框架中的原因。表达能力的缺乏产生于冯·诺伊曼语言不能有效的使用组合范式构造程序，这又顺次产生于表达式和语句间的分裂。组合范式是表达式中它们的最好形式，但是在冯·诺伊曼语言中一个表达式只能产生一个单独的字；因而在表达世界中的表达能力大部分失去了。对组合范式使用的进一步的障碍是命名约定的详细使用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第八节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">APL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（应用式程序设计语言）是第一个不基于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">演算，又是非一次一字的且使用函数组合范式的语言。但是它仍然保留了许多</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">冯·诺伊曼语言的问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第九节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼语言不具有有用的性质以证明程序合理性。公理语义和指称语义是用于描述和理解传统程序的精确工具，但是它们只能讨论它们且不能改变它们的笨拙的性质。与冯·诺伊曼语言不一样，普通的代数语言是适合于陈述它的定理和变换一个方程到它的解这二者的，而且所有这些都在“语言”之内。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第十节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">     
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">在一个历史敏感的语言中，一个程序能够影响后来的程序的行为，通过更改一些由系统保存的存储器。任何一个这样的语言都需要一些状态转换语义。但是它不需要与状态紧密耦合的语义，在这种语义里状态会随着计算的每一个细节而改变。“应用式状态转换”（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）系统被提出作为对</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">冯·诺伊曼系统的另一种历史敏感的选择。这些系统具有：（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">a</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）与状态转换松散耦合的语义，在这种语义里转换只在每一次主要计算里发生一次；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">b</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）简单状态和转换规则；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">c</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold">）一个隐含的，具有简单“归约”语义的应用式系统；（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">d</span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）程序设计语言和状态转换规则二者都基于隐含的应用式系统和它的语义。接下来的四节描述了这种实现非冯·诺伊曼语言和系统设计的方法的基本要素。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第十一节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">描述了不使用变量的一类非正式函数式程序设计（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）系统。每个系统都从对象，函数，函数范式和定义建立而来。函数映射对象到对象。函数范式组合已有的函数形成新的函数。这一节列出了原始函数和函数范式的例子，并给出了例子程序。它讨论了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统的局限性和优点。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第十二节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">描述了一个“程序代数”，它的变量包括</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统的函数，它的“运算”是系统的函数范式。代数的二十四条定理的清单随着一个证明非反复的矩阵乘法程序和递归程序的等价性的例子给出。接下来的子目叙述了两个“展开定理”的结果，它们“解出”了两类方程。这些解表示这种方程中的“未知量”函数为一个无穷条件展开式，由它的行为的情况语句接情况语句的说明组成，并直接的给出了终止的充要条件。这些结果过去来自于“递归定理”和“迭代定理”，这些定理为一些适度一般化和有用的“线性”方程提供了一个现成的扩展。这些定理的使用实例论述了：（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">a</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）递归和迭代阶乘函数的正确性证明，（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt">b</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）两个迭代程序的等价性证明。最后一个例子处理了“二次”方程并证明了它的解是一个等幂函数。接下来的子节给出了两个展开定理的证明。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统相关联的代数被拿来与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">lambda</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">演算和其他的应用式系统的相应代数比较。这个比较表明了在与更加强大的经典系统比较时，从严格限制的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统中得到的许多优点。问题都显示在无穷展开函数的算法归约和在各种“惰性求值”中的代数使用方面。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第十三节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">这一节描述了正式函数式程序设计（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FFP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）系统，它扩展和明确了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统的行为。它们的语义比经典系统的更简单，且能够通过简单的不懂点参数表明其一致性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第十四节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">这一节比较了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">Algol</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">的结构与应用式状态转换（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）系统的结构。它描述了一个使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">FFP</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统作为它的应用式子系统的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统。它描述了系统的简单状态和转换规则。这种</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统的一个小的自我保护的系统程序也被描述，以及它如何能够建立和使用于文件维护和运行用户程序。这一节简要的讨论了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">系统的变体和函数命名系统，它能够在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt">AST</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">系统内定义和使用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:0cm;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-list:l18 level1 lfo23;
tab-stops:list 75.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">第十五节．<span style="font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";">       
</span></span></b><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">这一节简要的讨论了关于应用式计算机设计和发展与检测更实用的应用式系统模型作为未来这种设计的基础的工作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
